Package com.stasroshchenko.clinic.controller

Class HomeController

java.lang.Object
com.stasroshchenko.clinic.controller.HomeController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/") public class HomeController extends Object
The controller works with Home page, all the requests by "localhost:8080/" come into this controller.
Version:
1.0
